thread.title: Vivendi Buys Back into Videogame Business Via Minority Stakes
thread.title_full: Vivendi Buys Back into Videogame Business Via Minority Stakes - WSJ

author: Sam Schechner
title: Vivendi Buys Back into Videogame Business Via Minority Stakes
text:
PARIS—Vivendi SA is re-entering the videogame business, splashing out €160 million ($183 million) to buy stakes in French game publishers Ubisoft Entertainment SA and Gameloft SE.
The French media company said late Wednesday that it has spent €140.3 million to buy a 6.6% stake in Ubisoft and another €19.7 million to buy 6.2% of Gameloft.
The purchases are the latest indication of Vivendi Chairman Vincent Bolloré’s strategy... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
